Text:
For anyone interested in this:
no rip logs, no cues.
What a tragedy, forget about listening to the music.
this clown is a fucking jerk

"What a tragedy, forget about listening to the music."

Some people may not want to take a chance on downloading a rip that may or may not contain errors.  Even the best mastered CD can be ruined by a rip with errors.

Not everyone cares, but some do.  I was merely giving info so that users can decide for themselves if they want this or not.  No need for ignorant replies.

no o-fence, but last poster has valid point. downloaded some 24bit remaster converted to 16bit. that sounded like shit, not becouse of being downscaled to 16bit, but because someone didn't know what tF* he was doing. 
anyway Thanks
People download Audiochecker and check it.  Its 100% real.   These people that are saying these are fakes on my torrents are RIAA.
